name: @fooloomanzoo/datetime-input
description: an input for date and time

scripts.prepublish: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m "publish new version" && npm version patch && git push
scripts.gh-pages: git checkout gh-pages && git pull && bower update -f && git add . && git commit -m "update" && git push && git checkout master
scripts.build: git pull && bower update && npm run analyze

author: fooloomanzoo
